name: URLSession.ResponseDisposition
desc: Constants indicating how a data or upload session should proceed after receiving the initial headers.

items.name: case allow
items.desc: Allow the load operation to continue.

items.name: case becomeDownload
items.desc: Convert the response for this request to use a URLSessionDownloadTask.

items.name: case becomeStream
items.desc: Convert the response for this request to use a URLSessionStreamTask.
